meanings.definition: A decorative covering for a wall, often made of wood.
meanings.sent1: The panelling in the dining room adds a touch of elegance to the space.
meanings.sent2: The old house had beautiful panelling throughout, showcasing intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the panelling was a great place to hide and surprise its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the panelling on the wall, warm and inviting.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the window highlighted the panelling's rich color.

meanings.definition: The act of installing panels on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The panelling of the new tiles in the bathroom was done with precision and care.
meanings.sent2: The panelling of the stage was completed just in time for the big performance.
meanings.sent3: The panelling of the bookshelves turned into a fun DIY project for the weekend.
meanings.sent4: His words were like the panelling of a ship, guiding her through the stormy seas of life.
meanings.sent5: The panelling of the artwork on the gallery walls created a seamless display of creativity.
